short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension which offers you to renew all pending eBay classifieds with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
renewify makes it easy for you to quickly renew all classified ads with just one click directly from your browser. Never again forget to renew classified ads on your own, as the extension automatically checks if ads are about to expire in the background.

üî• Features
- reminds you to renew classifieds
- one-click renew
- lightweight and simple

üîê Privacy-first (OSS)
This extension is inactive on every other page than the ebay-kleinanzeigen.de page. So no sniffing around, not reading any messages, just offering you to bulk renew your classifieds. We need the rights to read your site data and tab info to detect if you're on the right page and to renew the classified ads. You can take a look at the source code at: https://github.com/kaibrune/renewify

ü§ù Compatibility
This extension only runs on the ebay-kleinanzeigen.de classifieds overview page.

üíå Feedback
You got any questions or improvements? Feel free to submit a pull-request. Cheers!
